title: Jabal al-Bayḍā
description: Hill southwest of Mount 'Abd al-'Aziz in Syria. The peak at the southwestern end of the hill is known as Rās et-Tell. Excavations were carried out there by Max von Oppenheim in the early 20th century, uncovering sculptures and graves from the Bronze Age.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate center point of Jabal al-Bayda, derived from an OpenStreetMap Way.
properties.title: OSM location of جبل البيضاء
